title: 06/16/21 DPS Hour 2 Jon Wertheim
itunes:title: 06/16/21 DPS Hour 2 Jon Wertheim
description:
Jon Wertheim talks to Dan about his book about 1984 called "Glory Days." Jon says that there could be a follow up book called 1985.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
